name: Poly FPS V: 0.55
description:
Poly FPS V0.55 is a update for Poly FPS D0.44, This update contains:
  • 26 total bug fixes,
  • Performance issues fixed (unstable 60fps)
  • Changes to ui,
  • New maps: (Desert/zombies, office lvl 5-9),
  • New weapons: ( Automatic pistol, new heavy pistol),
  • New bosses: (Stone golem and a rocket shooting boss),
  • Animations for the 2 new weapons.
  • New main menu.
  • And some other things.
